channel.title: Mingo County Emergency Management | Mingo County WV | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/mingooem

item.title: Road is now open again ***ATTN ROAD CLOSURE*** Rt 65 Belo E
item.description: Road is now open again ***ATTN ROAD CLOSURE*** Rt 65 Belo Exit will be temporarily shut down, please travel alternate routes, will update when the road is back open.

item.title: **PER DOH ROAD IS NOW CLEAR** **Rock Slide** Mingo 911 is re
item.description: **PER DOH ROAD IS NOW CLEAR** **Rock Slide** Mingo 911 is receiving calls of a rock slide on US Rt 65 between Lenore and Naugatuck please use alternate routes until DOH has time to work on it. We will update as soon as possible. Please share with others or if you know of anyone traveling that route contact them .
